about_the_game:
All sales go towards St. Jude Children's Research Hospital

This charity DLC makes it so that the first relationship upgrade that you choose will double in points.

About St. Jude Children's Research Hospital

St. Jude is leading the way the world understands, treats and defeats childhood cancer and other life-threatening diseases.
